QuestData.Title: Encroaching Elementals
QuestData.Description:
The crafters, artisans, and explorers of the Dragonscale Expedition are ill-suited to the vigors of battle.
But not you and I, $p.
Here in the Dragon Isles, let us use that strength to protect those who can't protect themselves.
Clear out the elementals encroaching from the north, so that the expedition can focus on their noble pursuits.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa primal elementals in Wingrest Embassy.
